## API Reference

## Packages

| Package                                            | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [@lynx-js/lynx-environment](./lynx-environment.md) | A pure-JavaScript implementation of the [Lynx Spec](https://lynxjs.org/guide/spec.html)<!-- -->, notably the [Element PAPI](https://lynxjs.org/api/engine/element-api) and [Dual-threaded Model](https://lynxjs.org/guide/spec#dual-threaded-model) for use with Node.js. |
